Uses of Interface
eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.FileStatus

  • Packages that use FileStatus 
    Package Description
    eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs  
    eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file  

    • Uses of FileStatus in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs

      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs that return FileStatus 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract FileStatus FileSystem.getFileStatus(Path f)
      Return a file status object that represents the path.
      abstract FileStatus[] FileSystem.listStatus(Path f)
      List the statuses of the files/directories in the given path if the path is a directory.
      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs with parameters of type FileStatus 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract BlockLocation[] FileSystem.getFileBlockLocations(FileStatus file, long start, long len)
      Return an array containing hostnames, offset and size of portions of the given file.
      int FileSystem.getNumberOfBlocks(FileStatus file)
      Returns the number of blocks this file/directory consists of assuming the file system's standard block size.

    • Uses of FileStatus in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file

      Classes in eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file that implement FileStatus 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalFileStatus
      The class LocalFileStatus provides an implementation of the FileStatus interface for the local file system.
